Your weekly instruction manual for saying or doing something in English is published every Friday. Each programme is six minutes long and contains examples and explanations to help you improve your knowledge of the English language across a wide range of topics.</description> <itunes:summary>Learn and practise useful English language for everyday situations with the BBC.
